title: Best Cars Dealership
description: The final project of the software developer certificate: a website for finding dealership locations and posting reviews.
longDescription1: This Django app is a review site for Best Cars Dealership.  It includes functionality to look up dealerships, read reviews, login, and write reviews.  This was the final capstone project for the IBM Full-Stack Software Developer Certificate that I completed in January.
longDescription2: The instructions for this project included code for several pieces and outlines of code for others.  It was up to me to assemble the pieces in the correct places and modify or write additional code to complete the project.
longDescription3: The app uses a few different frameworks: React for the frontend pages, Express and MongoDB for the backend functionality and database, all wrapped in a Django application to tie it together.
longDescription4: The project also included containerizing the ExpressMongo services using Docker and deploying a sentiment analyzer microservice from the IBM Cloud Code Engine.  CI/CD workflows using GitHub were added for linting and packaging.  Then the application was deployed using Kubernetes for container management.
